title: Implement diversified content feed with auto-balancing and smart tags
description:
‚úÖ Implemented diversified content feed with auto-balancing and smart tags:

COMPLETED:

- ‚úÖ Expanded scorer.ts with new categories (launch, trending, industry, tools, known_issue, case_study, community)
- ‚úÖ Adjusted scoring to be less polarized (BREAKING 95+, MAJOR 75-94, NOTABLE 55-74, INFO 40-54)
- ‚úÖ Implemented balanced feed algorithm in API route (Critical, New & Noteworthy, GitHub Spotlight sections)

close_reason: Successfully implemented diversified content feed system with auto-balancing algorithm, smart emoji tags, and section-based UI. Feed now shows diverse content types (breaking, launches, trending, tools, etc.) instead of being polarized toward breaking changes. All TypeScript compilation passes. Ready to test with real data from pipeline.
